name: Hide and seek (itch) (Brunoazca)
description:
Didn´t have time to finish... hope you enjoy the idea!

How to play: Find your friend who´s hiding from you! Press "Q" to use a termometer. It gets hotter near the hider. Beware the ghosts: they kill you by touch, but you can identify their presence as they cool the ambient. You have 200 seconds to find your friend, and the score is relative to the time left. As you increase your highscore in the levels, the main character obtain new skins (at total score 80 and 130)!
